archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Pre-Screening
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Screening againts internal data(Knock Off) : negative list, Fraud check
5. PRE-SCREEN DATA -Negative Checking Result - Fraud Checking result (Alert & Final Result)
6.VERIFICATION DATA - Type of Verivication : Web/desk , phone visit -Result
7. Collateral data - Type - Market Value - Appraisal type -Total security (sudah dijaminkan)
8. Scoring 9.Limit 10. Credit review - Deviation Matrix
